# Introduction
I am a second year MPH student in the Department of Health Policy and Management at Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health. I recently graduated from Cornell University with a degree in Biomedical Engineering and minor in English. I am interested in pursuing medicine in the future, working at the intersection of scientific innovation and service. I am passionate about utilizing public health perspectives in order to holistically approach health care and delivery. 


# Fun Facts

*   My family moved around often when I was younger, resulting in me changing schools 8 times and learning 5 languages.
*   At my fastest, I could read a 300 page book in 2 hours.
*   I used to build planes as part of a project team in undergraduate.
